title: Beramputen Beram venga phula an riah chilh laiin
lyrics:
Beramputen Beram venga
Phula an riah chilh laiin;
Angel ropui a lo lang a,
"Hlau suh ulang, ngai rawh u;
Mi tin ta tur Chanchin Tha leh
Lawm tlak em em
Ka rawn thlen che u," a ti.

"Chhandamtu pakhat a piang ta,
In tan Davida khuaah,
Lal Krista kha, Lal Krista kha,"
Tiin a zuk au ta a.
Nausen lawmawm, a hming Maka,
Remruattua,
Chatuan Pa, Remna Lal a ni.

Pathian Fa a ni, lo piang chu,
Mi sual, kei min tlan turin;
Pathianin min hmangaih em em,
A fapa mal min pe ta,
Amah lawmin kan rawn inkhawm,
A hming fakin,
Aw, khawvel zaiin khat se.
